node.title: Sharing the Cross, Shedding the Bias
node.description: There are some people in this world who we might easily deem as unreachable. Yet the truth is that often times a hard exterior has been created as a shield... or a siren. How does a well-meaning Christian reach out to the hurting souls around them? How can we help LGBTQ individuals? In this presentation we look at some helpful points on this topic.
